Buran (Persian: بوران, Russian: буран) bụ ifufe nké na-efefe Iran, ọwụwa anyanwụ Eshia, ọkachasị Xinjiang, Siberia, na Kazakhstan
N'elu tundra, a makwaara ya dị ka пурга, purga
Ọ bụ ifufe ikuku oyi, mgbé ụfọdụ siri ike, nkè a na-ahụkarị na steppes nké Sarmatic Plain, n'ébé ọdịda anyanwụ nkè Ural.
Buran na-ewere ụdị abụọ: n'oge okpomọkụ, ọ bụ ifufe na-ekpo ọkụ, nke na-eme ka mmiri na-efe efe; n'oge oyi, ọ na-ajụ ezigbo oyi ma na-esokarị snow
Ifufe buran n'oge oyi siri ike ma jupụta na ice na snow
A na-ejikarị snow jupụta n'eluigwe, nke na-agbagharị ma na-ebelata anya ruo ihe fọrọ nkè nta ka ọ bụrụ efu mgbé ụfọdụ
N'Alaska, a maara oké ifufe a na-esi n'ebe ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ dị ka burga ma na-eweta snow na ice pellets.
Ihe omume mbara igwe Soviet kpọrọ otu klas nké ụgbọ mbara igwe site na buran (lee mmemme Buran).
